info.name: Agrar Portal API - Complete & Updated
info.description: Complete and up-to-date API collection for Agrar Portal - All endpoints verified against codebase. Includes FAQ, Educational Content, Internship Programs, Certificate Management with expiry dates, User Progress/Results API, and all latest features. Last updated: November 2025.

request.description: Generate test token without email verification (development only). Automatically verifies email and enables 2FA for the user.
Generate admin test token for testing exam management APIs
Generate trainer test token for testing training/exam management APIs
Generate farmer test token for testing student functionality
Development OTP verification - accepts any 6-digit code (development only)
Development login OTP verification - accepts any 6-digit code (development only)

item.name: Get Dashboard
item.description: Get main dashboard data for authenticated user

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Advanced Crop Management",
  "description": "Learn advanced farming techniques",
  "category": "Crop Management",
  "trainer_id": 2,
  "start_date": "2025-01-01",
  "end_date": "2025-12-31",
  "is_online": true
}

item.name: List Public Trainings
item.description: Public endpoint - list all trainings. Optional auth for user-specific data.

item.name: Get Training Detailed View
item.description: Get comprehensive training details. Optional auth.

item.name: Get Trainings Dropdown
item.description: Admin/Trainer - Get trainings for dropdown selection

item.name: Mark Training Completed
item.description: Mark training as completed for authenticated user

item.name: Get Training Completion Status
item.description: Get user's completion status for a training

item.name: Upload Temporary Media
item.description: Upload temporary media during lesson creation

item.name: Add Lesson Notes
item.description: Add personal notes for a lesson

item.name: Get Lesson Notes
item.description: Get personal notes for a lesson

request.description: List categories with search, filtering, and pagination
Get active categories for dropdown selections (admin/trainer access)
Create new category (admin only)
Get category details with statistics
Update category (admin only)
Delete category (admin only) - prevents deletion if category has trainings
Get exam statistics for admin dashboard - total exams, active exams, completion rates, etc.
Get smart form data based on user role: Trainers see only their trainings, Admins see all. Includes categories for independent exams and supports_independent_exams flag.

query.description: Search in title, description, training title, or category
Filter by status: upcoming, active, ended
Sort by: title, created_at, start_date, end_date, passing_score

request.description: Enhanced exam listing with search, filtering, and pagination for admin dashboard

item.name: Create Training-Based Exam with Difficulty Levels

request.description: Create exam linked to training with difficulty levels (easy/medium/hard) for questions. Category auto-filled from training.
Create independent exam not tied to any training. Requires manual category assignment and supports all difficulty levels.
Get detailed exam information with statistics, recent registrations, and complete data
Update exam with change tracking and audit logging
Partial exam update - only specified fields will be updated
Delete exam with registration validation - prevents deletion if exam has registrations
Register user for exam (for students)
Start exam session (for students)

item.name: Submit Exam with Mixed Answer Types

request.description: Submit exam answers with timing validation. Returns score, timing info, and certificate if passed within time limit.
Test scenario: Submit after exam time limit exceeded. Should return 'timeout' status with no certificate.

item.name: Get Comprehensive Exam Stats
item.description: Admin only - Get comprehensive exam statistics

item.name: Get Detailed Exam List
item.description: Admin only - Get detailed list of all exams

item.name: Get Exam Form Data
item.description: Admin/Trainer - Get form data for creating exams

item.name: Get Exam for Taking (With Timing Info)

request.description: Get exam questions with real-time timing information. Shows time_elapsed, time_remaining, and time_exceeded status.
Submit exam within time limit. Should return 'passed' or 'failed' status with certificate if passed.
Check current exam session timing. Use this to get real-time timing updates during exam.

item.name: Exam Question Management (For Editing Existing Exams)
Share Certificate
item.description: Get shareable verification link for certificate

item.name: Get Certificate QR Code
item.description: Get QR code image (base64) for certificate verification

item.name: Upload Certificate Photo (Admin/Trainer)

formdata.description: Image file (jpeg, png, jpg, gif, max 5MB)

item.description: Upload photo for certificate (Admin/Trainer only). Accepts jpeg, png, jpg, gif files up to 5MB.

item.name: Generate Certificate PDF
item.description: Generate PDF certificate. Requires user_id, exam_id, and training_id. Certificate expiry date is calculated from exam's certificate_validity_days.

item.name: Vote on Poll
item.description: Vote on a forum poll question

{
  "first_name": "Updated First Name",

item.name: Get My Certificates

query.description: Filter by type: all, training, exam

item.description: Get all certificates for authenticated user. Automatically hides expired certificates. Filter by type: 'all', 'training', or 'exam'.

item.name: Get My Results/Progress

query.description: Filter period: today, week, year, all

item.description: Get comprehensive user progress and results. Returns key metrics (completed courses, ongoing courses, certificates earned, webinar participation), learning progress (overall progress %, weekly/monthly goals, total hours, daily streak), performance analytics (average score, learning effectiveness, knowledge retention rate), latest achievements, and course progress list.

item.name: Get Google Auth URL
item.description: Get Google OAuth2 authorization URL for Google Calendar access. User needs to visit this URL to authorize access.

item.name: Handle Google OAuth2 Callback
item.description: Handle Google OAuth2 callback and store access token. This endpoint is called after user completes authorization.

item.name: Check Google Calendar Access
item.description: Check if the authenticated user has valid Google Calendar access and can create meetings.

item.name: Revoke Google Calendar Access
item.description: Revoke Google Calendar access for the authenticated user. Clears stored access token.

item.name: Get OAuth2 Code from Session
item.description: Get OAuth2 code from session after user completes authorization process.

item.name: List Meetings

query.description: Filter by status: upcoming, live, past, scheduled, ended, cancelled

item.description: List Google Meet meetings with filtering options. Admin/trainer access required.

item.name: Create Google Meet Meeting
item.description: Create a new Google Meet meeting. Requires Google Calendar access. Admin/trainer access required.

item.name: Create Recurring Meeting

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Weekly Training Session",
  "description": "Weekly training session for farmers",
  "start_time": "2024-08-20T10:00:00Z",
  "end_time": "2024-08-20T12:00:00Z",
  "timezone": "UTC",
  "max_attendees": 30,
  "training_id": 1,
  "is_recurring": true,
  "recurrence_rules": [
    {
      "frequency": "weekly",
      "interval": 1,
      "count": 10
    }
  ],
  "attendees": []
}

item.description: Create a recurring Google Meet meeting with recurrence rules.

item.name: Get Meeting Details
item.description: Get detailed information about a specific meeting including status and attendee count.

item.name: Update Meeting
item.description: Update meeting details. Updates both Google Calendar event and database record.

item.name: Delete Meeting
item.description: Delete meeting from both Google Calendar and database. Admin/trainer access required.

item.name: Get Meeting Attendees
item.description: Get list of meeting attendees with registration status. Admin/trainer access required.

item.name: Register for Meeting
item.description: Register the authenticated user for a meeting. Checks for available spots and meeting status.

item.name: Cancel Meeting Registration
item.description: Cancel the authenticated user's registration for a meeting.

item.name: Get My Meeting Registrations
item.description: Get the authenticated user's meeting registrations with meeting details.

item.name: Upload Media to Training
item.description: Upload media files (images, videos, documents) to a training. Admin/trainer access required.

item.name: Get Training Media
item.description: Get all media files associated with a training.

item.name: Remove Media from Training
item.description: Remove a specific media file from a training.

item.name: Register for Training
item.description: Register the authenticated user for a training program.

item.name: Register for Exam
item.description: Register the authenticated user for an exam.

item.name: List Questions (Enhanced)

query.description: Search in question title and body

item.description: List forum questions with search and pagination support.

item.name: Get Question Details
item.description: Get detailed information about a specific forum question including answers.

item.name: Get Question Answers
item.description: Get all answers for a specific forum question with pagination.

item.name: Post Question (Enhanced)
item.description: Post a new question to the forum with enhanced metadata support.

item.name: Answer Question (Enhanced)
item.description: Answer a forum question with enhanced response features.
